comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic might have been taken from Parliament House...here we're looking across the Brisbane River towards South Brisbane. In the foreground we see William St...the damaged 1st (permanent) Victoria Bridge is also on view.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Thanks again quasymody! Great detective work! :)
